name: DurchZug
description:
Is it really a great catch, or the strong wind?

Durchzug is a german word that means strong wind. and Zug means train. Which already makes it clear that our game DurchZug is about strong winds and trains. In this game you can enjoy a fun and simple gaming experience. 

It's a little top down, collecting type game with traditionally hand drawn backgrounds. where objects fall out of the moving train and you need to reflect them back into the train with strong winds to make sure they dont get lost. 

This game is part of a Ghibli movie: The wind rises GameJam.
